TopicTitle: The unofficially official 0.24-Kerbapalooza Thread - Now extra #HYPETRAIN!

Articles.Content: Squad has the resources for pizza if they want it. Buy another copy of the game, or stick some money in an envelope and mail it to your favorite dev care of Squad. Free food arriving at the door sounds fun, but in reality it annoying. It is rarely what people actually want for lunch and often isn't touched, but nevertheless someone always has to clean it up.

I wonder if we will scare them.

"Hello this is Squad offices! How can we help you?"

"THIS IS THE HYPE TRAIN, WHERE DO YOU LIVE??"

Hey i just registered and can't comment yet for some reason. But MaxMaps told me on Twitter that that is indeed their address. Maybe announce that in the thread. Wish I could comment :/

and here we go Thank you geek180

I wonder if we will scare them.

"Hello this is Squad offices! How can we help you?"

"THIS IS THE HYPE TRAIN, WHERE DO YOU LIVE??"

If we are doing that we need to show up in an actual train. Not at the station, we are putting a train in front of their office, I don't care how many boosters we have to put on it to get it there.

Just now on twitter from MaxMaps in regards to if a pizza would be okay: "it would be universally approved insanity."

Yep. Address confirmed. Approval confirmed. All we need is how to pay, who will order, and final confirmation on what to order (assuming we get it form that dominos, we know where to order from, unless we want to reconsider that )

Paypal would probably be best...even if we just send reimbursement via paypal to whoever actually orders.

I can't order, on a smartphone currently.

Yep. Address confirmed. Approval confirmed. All we need is how to pay, who will order, and final confirmation on what to order (assuming we get it form that dominos, we know where to order from, unless we want to reconsider that )

I think the better option is for someone to volunteer, get a price range by making a mock-menu, including finding a dominos voucher (they are easy to find in google) then if they are willing, post their pay-pay details

Yep. Address confirmed. Approval confirmed. All we need is how to pay, who will order, and final confirmation on what to order (assuming we get it form that dominos, we know where to order from, unless we want to reconsider that )

We should tell the delivery guy to say something to squad, ie something about the hype train. Lol

Yep. Address confirmed. Approval confirmed. All we need is how to pay, who will order, and final confirmation on what to order (assuming we get it form that dominos, we know where to order from, unless we want to reconsider that )

well if your up for running it then ill donate to it and i suggest 3-4 pizzas, 1 cheese-1 pepperoni 1veggie- and 1 Meats
i talked just a minute ago, and they are 8 rigth now in the office

Squad has the resources for pizza if they want it. Buy another copy of the game, or stick some money in an envelope and mail it to your favorite dev care of Squad. Free food arriving at the door sounds fun, but in reality it annoying. It is rarely what people actually want for lunch and often isn't touched, but nevertheless someone always has to clean it up.

Pretty much this. Between gluten, lactose, and pork, you don't know what the developers could or would actually eat.
8 devs, 4 pizzas sounds about right. Note on the order should definitely indicate it's from the hypetrain!

Pretty much this. Between gluten, lactose, and pork, you don't know what the developers could or would actually eat.

The devs said they'd like pizza...

the point is not about the resources to buy a pizza i think, its about the nice touch of the comunity to the devs

- - - Updated - - -

better 5 or 6 pizzas i supose, so they have a little extra slice each

We should tell the delivery guy to say something to squad, ie something about the hype train. Lol

I will put down extra for his tip, lol.
I wonder if sending them pizza will make them release the update quicker... Hopefully!

I wonder if sending them pizza will make them release the update quicker... Hopefully!

I don't like to bribe, but it might motivate them!

Looking at the Dominos website, I propose:

1 Hawaiian Pizza

1 Veggie Pizza

1 Extra Cheese Pizza

1 Pepperoni Pizza

2-liter of pepsi

2-liter of 7up

any additions?

I have to keep reminding myself price is in pesos cause seeing pizza costing $212 freaks me out

Edit: I'd still prefer someone proficient in spanish either order online or call (which i am not) unless someone wants to take the chance on going through a site that may not be in a language they know xD. I'm just checking out the menu to see what our options are.

the point is not about the resources to buy a pizza i think, its about the nice touch of the comunity to the devs

This ^

/10char

This isn't your little sister's Hogwarts Express... This is the #HypeTrain!!!

Are we there yet!?!
